turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order pizza from Bella Luna's pizzeria. Can you help me out, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get one cheese pizza. I'm sorry, no wait. Let me start over. Can I get four small pizzas, all four of them thick crust? One pizza, a cheese pizza. Second, a meat lover's pizza. The third, a veggie lover's pizza. And the fourth, can I get a Hawaiian pizza with extra ham, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 small thick crust pizzas, 1 cheese, 1 meatlovers, 1 veggie lovers, and 1 hawaiin with extra ham, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much.
